data.meta_description: "Real Housewives of Atlanta" star Drew Sidora announced Tuesday that her father, Dr. Robert Jordan, died following a battle with Alzheimer's disease.
data.text:
Drew Sidora is mourning the loss of her father, Dr. Robert Jordan.

The â€œReal Housewives of Atlantaâ€ star announced on Instagram Tuesday that Dr. Jordan had died following a battle with Alzheimerâ€™s disease.

â€œYouâ€™re never prepared for the inevitable, but here we are,â€ she captioned a video montage of special moments with her dad, who passed away on Aug. 11.

â€œIt is with tears flowing, I announce that my father Dr. Robert A. Jordan has made his transition into Heaven,â€ she continued. â€œAs my mom says, He fought a good fight and finished his race, with a smile on his face he picked up his crown at Heavenâ€™s Gate!â€

Sidora, 38, then thanked everyone for sharing their personal stories of caring for a loved one who has Alzheimerâ€™s, a type of dementia that affects memory, thinking and behavior, per the Alzheimerâ€™s Association.

â€œI was a Daddyâ€™s Girl and I will cherish the precious memories that will forever live in my heart and his legacy lives forever!â€ she added.

The â€œGameâ€ alum said that Dr. Jordan was â€œthe best pediatrician in all of Chicagoâ€ and â€œwas passionate about helping people, saving lives and providing quality healthcare to those in the indigent community.â€

Sidora concluded her post by thanking everyone for their condolences and asking them to keep her family in their prayers as they continue to grieve.

â€œI thank God, knowing we will see you Daddy again!â€ she wrote.

Several Bravolebrities sent their condolences to Sidora in the comments section of her post.
